==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|type=112}}

===Etymology===
For four generations, [[w:Yuan Shao|Yuan Shao]]'s ancestors had occupied one of the [[三公]] posts ([[w:Three Excellencies|Three Excellencies]]: the three highest civil posts in the country):
* great great grandfather: [[w:Yuan An|Yuan An]] was a [[司徒]] ([[w:Minister over the Masses|Minister over the Masses]])
* great grandfather: [[w:Yuan Chang|Yuan Chang]] was a [[司空]] ([[w:Three Excellencies|Minister of Works]])
* grandfather: [[w:Yuan Tang|Yuan Tang]] was a [[太尉]] ([[w:Three Excellencies|Grand Commandant]])
* father: [[w:Yuan Feng|Yuan Feng]] was a [[司空]] ([[w:Three Excellencies|Minister of Works]])
